sn2.9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena candima devaputto rahuna asurindena gahito hoti.
sn2.9:1.3: Atha kho candima devaputto bhagavantam anussaramano tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
sn2.9:3.1: Atha kho bhagava candimam devaputtam arabbha rahum asurindam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn2.9:5.1: Atha kho rahu asurindo candimam devaputtam muncitva taramanarupo yena vepacitti asurindo tenupasankami; upasankamitva samviggo lomahatthajato ekamantam atthasi.
sn2.9:5.2: Ekamantam thitam kho rahum asurindam vepacitti asurindo gathaya ajjhabhasi:
